#define ME_EDIT_PAINT_SEL_MODE (   _me)
Value:
(                                        \
    (_me->editflag & ME_EDIT_PAINT_MASK) ? SCE_SELECT_FACE :                  \
        (_me->editflag & ME_EDIT_VERT_SEL) ? SCE_SELECT_VERTEX :              \
            0                                                                 \
    )
